Defs.RK_LetterWandererJoins: A ratkin {PAWN_title} named {PAWN_nameDef} has arrived and wants to join the colony.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] is willing to contribute, but will not leave voluntarily, claiming to have nowhere else to go. You can choose to turn {PAWN_objective} down and send {PAWN_objective} away. However, your colonists will be disturbed at sending someone away in need.
